title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: Francesco Farioli (Italian pronunciation: [faˈrjɔːli]; born 10 April 1989) is an Italian football manager. He is currently the head coach of Primeira Liga club Porto. Farioli started his coaching career in Turkey with spells at Fatih Karagümrük and Alanyaspor.

title: Francesco Farioli: Age, Net Worth, Career, Family & More - Mabumbe
snippet: Below is a detailed breakdown of his life, career, and legacy. Francesco Farioli was born in Rome, Italy, on April 11, 1987, to a family that appreciated the values of hard work and dedication.

title: Francesco Farioli - FC Porto - Coach Profile
snippet: Francesco Farioli is a 36-year-old Football coach born in Barga, Italy on 1989-04-10, who currently coaches FC Porto, in Portugal.

title: Francesco Farioli: Alanyaspor manager on Roberto De Zerbi, the Old Firm derby and Mikel Arteta's Arsenal | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: As a 19-year-old goalkeeper in Italy, one of Farioli's coaches advised him to go down the management pathway rather than continue playing. Although difficult to hear at the time, he has since acknowledged it was his best decision. He began planning for life away from playing and obtained a qualification in philosophy before putting in hours of work to secure his coaching qualifications.
